name: weak-armor

effect.sun_moon: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage. This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage. This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage. This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.

short_effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
